main event: A witness observed a single white oval object flashing and zigzagging in the sky over Brookfield, Ohio on August 15, 1958.
interesting points: The object was reported to be flashing alternately and was described as having an irregular zigzagging course., The sighting lasted approximately 1-2 minutes., The object was seen traveling at high speeds and suddenly disappearing., The sighting occurred around 8:54 PM EST., The report was part of a Project Blue Book record document.
witness description: Identifying information on observer is negative.
